original_text: Do not just think about your body, but think about what you are really like inside yourself. Be patient and do not become angry easily. Then you will always continue to be beautiful. If you are beautiful in your spirit, God likes that very much.
korean_text: 오직 마음에 숨은 사람을 온유하고 안정한 심령의 썩지 아니할 것으로 하라 이는 하나님 앞에 값진 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Do not just think about your body
but think about what you are really like inside yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너의 내면에서 실제로 어떤지를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: and do not become angry easily
Then you will always continue to be beautiful
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 언제나 아름다움을 유지할 것이다

sentences.original_text: If you are beautiful in your spirit
